definitions: a process of resolving something into its constituent elements or removing complication in order to clarify it

examples.text: the editor helped in the deconvolution of phrase and thought

shortDefinitions: process of resolving something into its constituent elements or removing complication

definitions: the resolution of a convolution function into the functions from which it was formed in order to separate their effects.
shortDefinitions: resolution of convolution function into functions from which it was formed

definitions: the improvement of resolution of images or other data by a mathematical algorithm designed to separate the information from artifacts which result from the method of collecting it.
shortDefinitions: improvement of resolution of images or other data by mathematical algorithm designed to separate information from artefacts which result from method of collecting it
